overview: At long last, everything you've always wanted to know about "down there" but were afraid to ask.  A tender tale wherein our heroine, Ms. V..soul sisters her way into your heart with the hottest rap this side of the uterus.  She sings!!! She dances!!! She's Big!!!  It's a wear and care manual, it's a delightful tour.
title: We're Talking Vulva
